resources.string: Sin permiso para acceder a los datos
Enabling flight mode will disable features such as Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and Alipay. To use the above features, please disable the flight mode in [System settings].
Para garantizar la integridad del sistema, esta aplicación no puede desinstalarse.
"Please bind first to have your data protected more safely."
Are you sure to ignore this device?
"Please make sure the device is turned on and within communication range."
Are you sure to disconnect it from device %1$s?
The PIN code or pairing key is incorrect. Unable to pair with %1$s .
"Are you sure to change the system language to %1$s?"
Are you sure to reboot it?
Are you sure to power it off?
Double tap to unlock the screen
Por favor, introduce una nueva contraseña.
Por favor vuelva a introducir tu nueva contraseña.
Por favor, introduce una nueva contraseña.
Por favor introduce tu contraseña actual.
Por favor, revísalo en la app de Amazfit
After enabling the brightness auto adjustment, you can move the slider to fine tune the brightness coefficient. After adjustment, the screen brightness will still vary with the ambient brightness.
After screen off timing is successfully set, the watch screen will not be on even when wrist raising or screen locking.
Setting low-light for lock screen mode will reduce battery life.
How to draw an unlock pattern?
Press and hold the lower button to open

The system automatically enables and disables the mobile data feature according to your current network usage, which will help you reduce power consumption and save traffic, but it may also result in being unable to answer calls and receive text messages.
The \"Data roaming\" service allows you to use mobile data services in other countries, but additional costs may be generated.
Go to the Profile > My watche > Mobile network page in the Amazfit App to check the related tutorial.
When the monthly traffic usage reaches the set traffic upper limit, the mobile data will be automatically turned off, and it will be automatically turned on next month.
You will be notified when your monthly traffic usage reaches 50%, 80%, 100% of the set traffic upper limit.
The watch will remind you when you are far away from your mobile.
Por favor, introduce el nuevo código pin de nuevo.
Por favor, introduce un nuevo código pin.
Por favor, introduce el código pin antiguo.
Por favor, introduce un código pin.

The SIM card has been locked and can be unlocked with the PUK code. Please contact your carrier for the PUK code. If the PUK code is locked, the SIM card will be unusable, so please be careful when you retry.
Por favor, introduce el código PUK.

The SIM card has been permanently locked and cannot be used. Please switch to another SIM card in the Amazfit App or activate another card after removing this card. Please consult your carrier for details.
Failed to modify the PIN code of your SIM card.
The PIN code of your SIM card modified successfully.
The activated SIM card has been locked. You need to enter your passwords to unlock the SIM card after the system reboots.
You can still try for %1$d time(s).
The current mobile network is not available. Do you want to have the mobile network automatically selected?

When the watch has any data error, unexpected state, etc., you can upload the data to our server through the watch feedback feature. Our after-sales staff will then analyze the data. During the process, the logs previously generated in the watch will be automatically collected and uploaded, which will be used for problem analysis only and will be destroyed immediately after analysis. The entire process will be governed by our privacy policy. Please check the Privacy Policy in the Amazfit App for details.

When the watch has any data error, unexpected state, etc., you can upload the data to our server through the watch feedback feature. Our after-sales staff will then analyze the data. During the process, the logs previously generated in the watch will be automatically collected and uploaded, which will be used for problem analysis only and will be destroyed immediately after analysis. The entire process will be governed by our privacy policy. Please check the Privacy Policy in the Amazfit App for details.
The watch will be disconnected from your mobile and all data in the watch will be deleted. The current activated transportation card can still be used after the watch is bound again.
Please remove the UnionPay card first.
The UnionPay card will be unbound from the watch and the Amazfit App. The watch will still retain the payment function of the transportation card.
Failed to remove the UnionPay card. Please try again.

After factory resetting, it will be disconnected from your mobile and all data in your watch will be deleted. The current activated transportation card can still be used after your watch is bound next time.

After factory resetting, it will be disconnected from your mobile and all data in your watch will be deleted. The current activated transportation card can still be used after your watch is bound next time.

"If you want to unbind the watch, please do so in the Amazfit App. After factory resetting on the watch alone, the UnionPay card and transportation card will be removed. - UnionPay card removed: It can not be bound by the watch any more. If you need to bind it again, please consult the bank customer service. - Transportation card removed: It will be permanently destroyed and no longer payable."
This operation is invalid. Please exit the battery saver mode first.
Once the password is set, you will have to enter the password when you power off/on your watch or use the card package.

Once your watch wakes up and detects that your mobile has been unlocked, it will unlock itself automatically. It requires your watch being connected to your mobile normally, and your mobile needs to set a password.
Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo %1$d segundos más tarde.
Alerta de detección de actividad desactivada
It will remind you to disable the exercise mode and save the record when it detects that you end running or walking. Do you want to enable it?
Alerta de detección de actividad activada
After enabled, it will remind you to disable the mode and save the results when it detects that your exercise ends.
After enabled, it will remind you to enable the exercise mode by shortcut when it detects that you are running or walking.
It will remind you to enable the exercise mode when it detects that you start running or walking. Do you want to enable it?
Forcefully stopping may cause App exception. Continue?
Please check it in the Amazfit App.
Are you sure to power it off?
Are you sure to reboot it?

System resetting will unpair it with your mobile and clear all user data. The activated \"eSIM card\", \"Bank card\" and \"Transportation card\" can still be used after the watch is bound again. Are you sure to reset the system?
A new version has been detected.
The updates downloaded successfully. Do you want to reboot the watch to update the system?
The remaining battery is too low. Please charge your watch battery to 30% or above and try again.
Unable to connect it to network
It is already the latest version.
Acceso directo de doble pulsación del botón
Encender pantalla con Giro de Muñeca
The device protection feature will not work.
Before enabling, please confirm with your carrier that this feature has been activated, otherwise, your normal calls may be affected.
"After enabled, the watch will only support time displaying, step counting and transportation card payment. (You can exit this mode by pressing and holding the physical key after it is enabled.)"

"Once it's turned off, you have to tap the screen before you can operate every time you raise your wrist. Once it's turned on, you can operate directly after raising your wrist, but it will reduce your watch's battery life."
